item.title: Posix API introduction: mkstemp.
item.description: A new post here: https://bladesu.github.io/learning/linux_app/fileio/api_mkstemp/ I start to introduce the some knowledge about system calls, posix API and application implementation on linux platform. Here we start with a convenient posix API mkstemp. Any feedbask is welcome, thank you.
